issue.summary: clone BX323994.9 should be on chromosome 5
issue.description: clone BX323994.9 on chromosome 13 should be on chromosome 5 as it contrains the 5' end of the taf6 gene found on chromosome 5
issue.resolution_text: BX323994.9 has been shown to belong on chr5 by FISH and end sequence alignments, moved to chr5.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site
issue.status_text:
The misplaced Zv9 scaffolds, Zv9_scaffold1864 aligns to AL929392.11 which has been reassigned to chr18 based on FISH. Zv9_scaffold1880 Aligns best to CR854988 chr14, Zv9_scaffold1882 unknown placement but does not match well to the region it was placed for Zv9. These will be updated for the new build.
Zv9_NA509, Zv9_NA844, Zv9_NA856, Zv9_NA97 and Zv9_NA738 can be linked by end sequence data to Zv9_scaffolds in the telomeric region of chr13 so should be placed here in the new build.
issue.description: The placement of scaffolds Zv9_scaffold1864, Zv9_scaffold1880 and Zv9_scaffold1882 in the Zv9 build has been identified as incorrect based on homozygosity mapping, and does not belong in the telomeric region of chr13. Homozygosity mapping also indicates that Zv9 scaffolds Zv9_NA509, Zv9_NA844, Zv9_NA856, Zv9_NA738 and Zv9_NA97 belong in the telomeric region of chr13.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site
issue.description: CU929290.9 is no longer in the chromosome 13 reference Tile path as it was discovered it was deleted
issue.resolution_text: There was a duplication of two genes in Zv9 (Manba and SLC39A8) between CR559945.12 and CU929290.9. Removing CU929290.9 has resolved this false duplication. CU929290.9 also had a large deletion of sequence so it was removed for Zv10 and a different path is available in this region in Zv10. Please see http://geval.sanger.ac.uk/Zfish_GRCz10/Location/View?r=13:11511693-11841920

issue.summary: Gene ppp1r21 is misrepresented in GRCz10 due to a mis-assembly
issue.status_text: There is what appears to be a large 'intron' in gene ppp1r21, which is due to a mis-assembly in the whole genome shotgun contigs. All the contigs placed between CABZ01084366 and CABZ01084367 should not be there.
issue.description: Gene ppp1r21 is misrepresented in GRCz10 due to a mis-assembly
issue.resolution_text: na
